website_summaries.verdict: The steel build of this product offers coffee drinkers remarkable freshness along with a sleek design.
pros: Included scoop is magnetic, allowing it to easily attach and stay on the canister's exterior
Silicone seal allows for airtight preservation
cons: Some buyers wished the container sealed more tightly shut

customer_reviews.title: Love the feel and exterior finish
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and exterior finish. One thing that I absolutely hate is the plastic rim inside the container. Not because its plastic, but because there is an inconvenient gap/trench/lip under it; making it very difficult when tilting the canister to get the last of your coffee grounds out. This also makes cleaning the canister quite a challenge. It should have been flushed with the body of the canister.
customer_reviews.author: Jose L. Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: The lid is a problem.
customer_reviews.text: Only 3 stars because of the lid. Unless you have very large hands the lid is very difficult to grasp and open or close tightly. Just not very ergonomic. It also only turns just sufficiently enough to “sort of” close the lid well. I keep ground coffee in this container and coffee grounds stick to the inside of the lid and make a mess of coffee grounds on my counter, when unscrewing and removing the lid. The magnetic scoop is gimmicky as it interferes with closing the lid of the container when the scoop is in place. I have had this container for some time..hated to replace it. But looking for something better.
customer_reviews.author: PeytonRose

customer_reviews.title: ... been keeping my ground coffee in a ziplock bag like some kind of peasant
customer_reviews.text: I've been keeping my ground coffee in a ziplock bag like some kind of peasant. Finally was able to treat myself like royalty with this fine canister. The ritual of preparing coffee is as much a part of the experience as the actual high, so to me this is worth having. The heft and smooth feel of the well polished stainless steel warms me in anticipation of the impending smoky deliciously bitter brew.
customer_reviews.author: momochi

customer_reviews.title: Great buy but not perfect solution.
customer_reviews.text: Quality construction, and good value (got on sale) but could use stronger magnet. Scoop can fall off if you set unit down hard on counter and land in coffee occasionally. Used with normal use won't be major problem. Some grinds can collect on screw part, so version 2.0 would be better with different design. Seals great and I would buy again. Worth 4 stars and good buy just not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: vtmiller

customer_reviews.title: overall good, weak magnet
customer_reviews.text: The canister looks nice next to the other stainless items in the kitchen, so no problem with the aesthetics. As other reviewers have mentioned, the magnet on the top is pretty weak. If you put the top on too quickly or if the scoop is off center at all, it will fall off. But not a big deal, it just ends up on top of the grounds or beans. If you are filling a reusable Keurig cup or something with similar diameter, the scoop is too wide and it spills over the edge when filling. I understand this is probably a pretty small market, but just an observation. Otherwise the look, sealing ability and build quality all seem done well.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Dzubay

customer_reviews.title: Great Coffee Canister
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased with this reasonably priced coffee canister. It seals well and holds a one pound bag of coffee beans. The included scoop was a nice addition. The canister and the scoop are well made and serve their intended purpose well while looking high-end. I appreciate that it looks nice enough to leave out on the counter while keeping my coffee beans fresh. The only negative that I could think of would be if you are a person that stresses out over visible fingerprints on stainless steel.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Excellent canister for coffee beans
customer_reviews.text: This is a terrific canister for coffee. It looks great on my counter and holds more than a pound of coffee beans. It's easy to open, seals tightly to maintain the flavor of my coffee beans and has a very nice scoop that magnetically sticks to the bottom of the lid when it is closed. My fat hand fits all the way inside to scoop beans from the bottom easily. I love this canister so much I am ordering a second one for my other house. After all these years of wrestling coffee bags in the morning this is a wonderful addition to my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Robert A. Stein

customer_reviews.title: Large, durable, magnet in top of lid for spoon!
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this coffee canister. It holds a lot which is a plus. It also has the magnetic spoon which is great! I did however think the spoon itself was magnetic when it's actually a magnet built into the lid..still works perfectly! The only issue I have with this canister is that it's difficult to close. I believe this is due to a thick plastic around the top of the canister & also on the lid. Once you get used to closing it, it becomes very easy and simple. I would recommend this coffee canister.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Eddy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive and useful canister. I h a 've doubts about the air-tightnes. But the price is great, and it definitely doses a much better job of keeping coffee fresher than just leaving it in the bag. It also protects your brew from light. I got two gators and an air-vac variety at about the same time. This one is doing fine, but I likely will use it to store tea bags in the future. It's definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Spalding W. Coyote

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: We use this in our refrigerator to hide cash and valuables in. Even if the house burns down, the $ will probably survive and burglars won't notice it, and we'll have cash in hand for the Zombie apocalypse. Who'll be laughing then?
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: I like it!
customer_reviews.text: It seems to have a better seal than my glass jars, plus it has the distinct advantage of blocking light as it is stainless steel. I use a measuring cup when I make coffee as it would be too many scoops, but the accompanying scoop, with the magnetic attachment to the top of the canister, would be very handy for those who do use one when making their coffee. I just received it, so cannot speak to it's long-term durability or storage effectiveness, but for now, I am very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: vn dd

customer_reviews.title: A Container I Regret Purchasing
customer_reviews.text: I liked the size of this container and that it was made with Stainless Steel. After I received this item I immediately regretted spending the money for this item. This is the first time something that is supposedly made with Stainless Steel discolored (and with that being the first time I touched it!) abd the staining would not go away. So far everything else is okay but I seriously doubt that this item is made with quality in mind.
customer_reviews.author: justme624

customer_reviews.title: Great canister.
customer_reviews.text: Although this says it is a coffee canister, I use it at work to store my sweetener. Not only does the lid close tightly (keeping my sweetener free from visitors), but the magnet inside the lid helps keep the scoop from becoming buried in an avalanche of powder when I pick up the container or accidentally knock it off its shelf. The approximately 1 Tbs. scoop is perfect for my needs and makes fixing a quick cup of tea a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia

customer_reviews.title: Don't give me any lip!
customer_reviews.text: This coffee dispenser works fine EXCEPT for the fact that there's a lip inside the container portion that makes it near impossible to scoop out the remaining tablespoon or so of coffee. So there it stays unless you care to turn the dispenser upside down to shake out the remainder. Guess no one with their design team ever used the container. Maybe we shouldn't either.
customer_reviews.author: rm

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly holds a pound off beans.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to put my beans in rather than keeping them in the bag supplied by the store. I bought two so that I can take them with me for refills ,,, no more bags at all. The two containers fit easily into my back pack. Screw on lid keeps the beans fresher than before ... and nice extras are included. An excellent bean scoop come with each container and BlickOne sends you by email an excellent write-up on the history and brewing of coffee. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mark barden

customer_reviews.title: Great but not for small hands
customer_reviews.text: I have small hands so it’s hard to get a grip to screw the top on. The canister is larger than it appeared in the photo. When I think it’s closed, sometimes it isn’t, so that will affect the freshness of the stored coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Rileymom

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee canister
customer_reviews.text: Love this canister, but improvements are welcome! The lid is the only part that is magnetized. I would prefer putting it on the side instead but at least I have a scoop now!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer R Van Matre

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee bean container
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little container for coffee beans. Was able to put a whole bag of beans (sorry can't remember if it was a 12 or 16 ounce bag - I think it was 16) . The beans are kept nice and fresh (but to be fair we go through them pretty quickly). The container looks nice on the shelf, too. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: attractive and works well for beans
customer_reviews.text: very clever that spoon magnetically sits on top giving it a modern look. i find my beans tasting very fresh after being stored. i will order a few as xmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: pamela harris

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Only reason for 4 stars is because the magnet on the lid could be a little stronger. Every so often the scoop falls into the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Vee

customer_reviews.title: Fits a pound of coffee in it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband picked this out to store his coffee in and when it arrived I thought it would be a little too small to hold all of the coffee he had just bought at the store. Thankfully I was wrong! This one held the whole bag and came with a scoop (that fit in as well after adding the coffee) and looks nice on the shelf. Good choice honey!!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Hall

customer_reviews.title: Canister is ok
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for this canister but I'm not overly impressed. I have hard time screwing the lid on... it just doesn't seem to be closed all the way, but I guess it is. I would expect it to screw on a bit tighter. It's stainless steal, which means it's left with lots of finger prints/marks on it. Just doesn't look pretty when sitting on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Lawler

customer_reviews.title: I use this for ground coffee. Due to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for ground coffee. Due to the tapered top, it makes it hard for me to reach in when it's getting low because of my large hands. The scoop is slightly larger than the opening for my kurig capsule,but I've learns to finess it. Also the magnet is kind of weak, so I frequently find the scoop in the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Not for me, ugly when unboxed
customer_reviews.text: Tried to find a good way to store coffee beans but this did not appeal to me after unboxing. It seems well made except for the cheap seal that was hanging loose from the lid. Returned and never used. Bought the EVAK cannisters which I love.
customer_reviews.author: SCOTT

customer_reviews.title: The can is perfect, but I use a different scope in it ...
customer_reviews.text: The can is perfect, but I use a different scope in it - the one that came with it is fine and with the magnet in the lid the scoop was usually handy, but I liked my long handled scoop better. It is a little easier to handle when getting coffee out of the can. Coffee is always fresh and wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. The design is stylish, and because I refill my coffee frequently, I never have any problems with scooping out the last bits (as some reviewers mention). Looks good and works fine. My only complaint is the screw-on lid -- it never seems to feel fully closed, although I think that's because they designed it not to be rotated much. It is closed; we just don't have to twist it as much as usual. Very happy with this buy.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Keulks

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars simply because mine was definitely used before I got it... it still had coffee grounds in it. But, I am super easy so I just washed it out and it functions perfectly fine. I don't think the lid is that large like other people mentioned, seems easy to screw/unscrew... maybe I just have large man hands for a woman? Fits a great amount of coffee, looks nice on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: EmilyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Larger than it looks.
customer_reviews.text: I use the canister to store my ground coffee. It was easy to clean.The only thing I didn’t like after washing water pools under the rim when inverted.So I wonder recommend towel drying instead of allowing to drip dry.The canister is larger than I thought it would be.I like that the look is brushed rather than a bright shiny steel patina. The slightly darker hue works with my brushed nickel fixtures.I may gift this product to other coffee lovers in my family.
customer_reviews.author: ABE

customer_reviews.title: Nice, But...
customer_reviews.text: Fine quality canister. I believe it is truly air-tight. However, the magnet and scoop arrangement is worthless. The scoop just falls into the coffee. And it is too 'rotund' to get my hand around. There is no handle of any kind. Even indentations would help. Sort of have to lift it with two hands...
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Fresh Coffee every time.
customer_reviews.text: When I open this canister the kitchen fills with the aromas of coffee that have been trapped since the last time I opened it. Which I just love. I have but one complaint thus far. It would seem this product could benefit from a better base. or an addition to the base, let me explain, the bottom offers no protection to the counter-top, and will leave skid marks behind after time. which do clean up just fine, but I think a rubber ring type barrier would be a great addition, to prevent scuffs.
customer_reviews.author: joey

customer_reviews.title: No more coffee mess
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this canister! No more mess when I make my coffee in the morning, thanks to the magnetic lid and scoop. It looks so much neater on the counter. I just ordered a second one so that we can have one for flavored coffee and one for regular.
customer_reviews.author: LH29

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and helpful
customer_reviews.text: I not only love how well this thing works but I love how it looks. It looks lovely sitting out on my counter next to my Keurig
customer_reviews.author: Molly Moller

customer_reviews.title: screw down lid
customer_reviews.text: i liked the stainless steel and that it is air tight
customer_reviews.author: jime simpson

customer_reviews.title: Very stylish. The magnetic scoop is really helpful.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice canister. Looks nice. The lid seals well. The best part is the magnetic scoop. The coffee measure is always an odd man out on the counter. Now it's in one place. Nice idea.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Adsit

customer_reviews.title: nice canister and scoop, but a little a the small side
customer_reviews.text: Nice canister and scoop, but a little on the small side. I buy coffee in bulk, the more the cheaper and while the canister is the proper size for most bags , I had some coffee left over.
customer_reviews.author: M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: The canister was just what I was looking for to keep my coffee fresh. I like the stainless steel since it is easy to care for and more sanitary than the plastic container I was using for 100 years. It holds a bag of Starbucks coffee too so it is plenty big and doesn't take up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: molly

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly for keeping my grounds fresh, although the little scoop that is supposed to stick to the inside top by magnet always falls off. I just use my own plastic one with a longer handle anyways.
customer_reviews.author: ZSW

customer_reviews.title: Quality of product
customer_reviews.text: The quality craftsmanship of this airtight canister is excellent. Perfect size to handle everyday usage, not to mention it's a handsome addition to my kitchen counter. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised!
customer_reviews.text: I love that the scoop stores inside the cover so it can't get lost. It has kept the coffee beans nice and fresh, although they don't last all that long in our house so I can't speak to storage for more than a week. It's a nice size so it can be stored on the counter or in a cabinet without a problem.
customer_reviews.author: N. Fall

customer_reviews.title: Nice and classy design
customer_reviews.text: Looks simple and clean. I store my coffee beans in this and happens to contain the whole bag easily. The magnetic lid is a nice design choice.
customer_reviews.author: Viraltempo

customer_reviews.title: BlinkOne Coffee Canister
customer_reviews.text: This canister is just perfect. I searched for one that would keep whole beans fresh and still look high quality and this fits the bill. I wasn't sure it would hold the entire bag (24 ox) of whole beans but it did! It's also very attractive and looks great on my counter. I definitely recommend buying this canister,
customer_reviews.author: Donna Stern

customer_reviews.title: MMMmmmmm Fresh coffee.
customer_reviews.text: This canister works great!! I use it to store already ground coffee. My coffee tastes and smells as good as when I opened it. I love not having to dig for the scoop since it's always magnetically attached to the cover. Well one time I did since I was a klutz and dropped the container on the floor(no damage). I would recommend this item to anyone I know!!!
customer_reviews.author: michael s

customer_reviews.title: Good container
customer_reviews.text: The magnet is not very strong and the scoop has a tendency to drop. Other than that, it looks nice and close/seals nicely.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Attractive & Convienient
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice container to hold our fresh ground coffee, keeps it fresh & the scoop holds to the inner lid magnetically is very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Joy Keezer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect coffee holder with magnetized measuring scoop in lid so ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect coffee holder with magnetized measuring scoop in lid so I never gets lost. Plus a great PDF file on origins and all types of coffees as a bonus from seller. Awesome
customer_reviews.author: crystal scott

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and functions wonderfully
customer_reviews.text: This great looking coffee cannister has a magnetic scoop so you never have to go looking for it. Good seal keeps coffee fresh. Love.
customer_reviews.author: Curnutte

customer_reviews.title: Love the scoop in the lid.
customer_reviews.text: No more digging to find the scoop in the canister or in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: beet1e

customer_reviews.title: High quality airtight stainless coffee container
customer_reviews.text: Love this high quality coffee container. Was previously using a stainless canister but this is more airtight to keep our coffee fresher. Plus the magnetic coffee scoop solves a problem that I didn't pay alot of attention by keeping the scoop from getting buried down in the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: GrayJ1

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Finally something to keep my expensive coffee fresh! This container not only is functional but attractive too. I keep it on my countertop. The magnetic top to keep the scoop from being buried is a definite plus!!
customer_reviews.author: Nanaval

customer_reviews.title: Best value for money storage container -
customer_reviews.text: "Great packaging, great product - best container for coffee beans that we have found !"
customer_reviews.author: M Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great, large capacity coffee storage container
customer_reviews.text: Large capacity container. I like that the scoop is magentic and sticks to the roof of the lid.
customer_reviews.author: wyczguy

customer_reviews.title: Stylish
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice looking coffee canister to sit on the counter. It has a brushed silver appearance and goes great with our stainless appliances. The lid is magnetic and the scoop sits on top. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Compact and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and the stainless steel. Magnet not as strong to hold scoop in place but not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyski

customer_reviews.title: I love this canister
customer_reviews.text: I should have purchased two... I love this canister!!! It's convenient to have the scoop readily available. I still might order a second one to store another blend of coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Joann

customer_reviews.title: If you grind your own coffee get this
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had it for a while now, my coffee still smells great, hasn’t rusted, looks very sleek
customer_reviews.author: Wanderlust

customer_reviews.title: Better than coffee cans!
customer_reviews.text: This canister is really great! Keeps my coffee grounds fresh. I'm an avid coffee drink so I have to replenish weekly but just the same it holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey S.

customer_reviews.title: I love this canister and the scoop that attaches to the ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this canister and the scoop that attaches to the lid magnetically. It holds an ample amount of coffee while not taking up a lot of space on my counter (next to my coffee maker)! Love, love, love it!
customer_reviews.author: lilhigg

customer_reviews.title: Does keep coffee fresh
customer_reviews.text: Like the product very much , but wish I had bought a larger on.
customer_reviews.author: vmp

customer_reviews.title: The canister is beautiful. The scoop is also of great quality
customer_reviews.text: The canister is beautiful. The scoop is also of great quality. The lid screws on, but only a 1/2 - 3/4 turn. Some reviews say that the lid couldn't seal properly, but I find that it does seal.
customer_reviews.author: Cory

customer_reviews.title: Nice coffee canister.
customer_reviews.text: Like the looks on the counter very much and it holds a nice amount of coffee beans. The little scoop is a nice touch. Would be better if it had one more turn of the top as my lid comes loose easily. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MarleneLouiseTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Forever
customer_reviews.text: I think this thing will last forever lol good quality
customer_reviews.author: Ivan B.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Bought to give as white elephant gift. Was so impressed I bought one for myself. "
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds Coffee
customer_reviews.text: Product does what it is supposed to do and looks rather nice. The included scoop is a plus. Build quality seems great as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: I gave this to my neighbor for Christmas and she ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my neighbor for Christmas and she raves about it! Today 5 months later she is still telling me how much she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: W. Castleberry

customer_reviews.title: Design is nice but the inside lip makes it annoyingly hard to clean.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice but a bit smaller than I wanted/expected but that is on me. Design is nice but the inside lip makes it annoyingly hard to clean.
customer_reviews.author: S. Isom

customer_reviews.title: Nice canister
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and has a wide mouth which makes it easy to get the coffee in from the bag.
customer_reviews.author: gadget nut

customer_reviews.title: Great item and it looks amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's big enough to hold a pound of coffee and then some yet it's not so big that i can't hold it in my hands to comfortably open easily. I do wish the magnet was a little stronger (that's my fave part and why I bought it) as the internal scoop tends to fall into the chamber/coffee if jostled a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Broadbent

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Looks ok but don’t see how this is going to be airtight. Very small. Feels & looks cheap. Bought as gift. Kind of embarrassed to give it. May return
customer_reviews.author: Stormy

customer_reviews.title: Good coffee canister
customer_reviews.text: Air tight and bigger than I though, I like the magnet lid feature
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I just love everything about this caninster, above all I do not lose the spoon!
customer_reviews.author: gwendolyn l gullick

customer_reviews.title: It seems very strong and sturdy and should work great
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for someone. It seems very strong and sturdy and should work great. The scoop magnetizes to the top of the canister which is quite clever.
customer_reviews.author: M.A.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I love the magnetic spoon/scoop. It is a bit bigger than I expected. (size is given in description) I want to use it for preground coffee and feel that the seal isn't quite secure enough for that, BUT it is listed as a coffee bean storage not ground coffee. "
customer_reviews.author: Lara Pearson

customer_reviews.title: Very attractive
customer_reviews.text: I love the magnetic measuring spoon that fits on underside of the lid. No more fishing in the coffee grounds. The canister is very attractive and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bbacon

customer_reviews.title: Love this container!
customer_reviews.text: This container is extremely nice. Perfect size for my needs, but perhaps the best feature is the magnetic scoop. I usually just throw it on the inside of the lid so it's always available. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: No fingerprints!
customer_reviews.text: No fingerprints on the stainless! Excellent product. I should have paid more attention to the size. I will check to see if they have larger sizes and get a few more to match.
customer_reviews.author: kaylaann

customer_reviews.title: Great Cannister!
customer_reviews.text: The BlinkOne Cannister Is everything its advertisement says it is. It is truly air tight and it keeps my coffee fresh long after the beans are ground. I'm very happy with the BlinkOne Cannister.
customer_reviews.author: R. K. Wigal

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made and like the fact that the included spoon ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very attractive canister. Nicely made and like the fact that the included spoon stores inside the lid. I am using it for loose tea leaves. I might buy another for coffee.
customer_reviews.author: C. Trimble

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, does the trick. Beans stay fresh!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look of this. Magnet for spoon could be a bit stronger so it doesnt fall into the beans if bumped.
customer_reviews.author: HH

customer_reviews.title: Keeps coffee fresh
customer_reviews.text: This coffee canister is heavy duty and has a nice seal when closed. I know my coffee will stay fresh and I love the magnetic spoon! I wish it was a little larger, but it still works for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Jacci

customer_reviews.title: Nice airtight canister.
customer_reviews.text: Canister is attractive & I like that the measuring spoon stays in the lid by magnets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: Love how easy it is to use. Is air tight!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee
customer_reviews.text: Attractive, well-made, durable, great seal. Nice stainless coffee measure spoon included.
customer_reviews.author: skp

customer_reviews.title: Works like it says.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my stevioside powders as they easily become airborne and make breathing in the area unpleasant. Works perfectly. Even filled it with water and set it on its head with no leaks. Will buy again for coffee and other bulk spices.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Air tight for my coffee n keeps it fresh. Love the crime/stainless steel it matches all other appliances
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So pleased
customer_reviews.text: At last, an attractive container that is truly air-tight as advertised! I purchased two of these for loose-leaf teas and I could not be more pleased. They not only work as promised, they are also quite attractive. The bonus magnetic spoon is also quite lovely.
customer_reviews.author: T. BlackTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Air tight
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift to my brother and his wife since they are coffee drinkers. He called me to say that they like the canister and feel that it keeps the beans fresh and air tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Jen

customer_reviews.title: It's the little things
customer_reviews.text: So..it's a canister. It does what it was designed to do perfectly. It's a lot bigger than I thought it would be and that makes it easy to clean. I love the magnetic scoop holder.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Read

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Love the magnetic scooper because I am notorious for losing them. Sleek little coffee canister to leave out on the counter. Recommending this!
customer_reviews.author: Ama1478

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good container for my coffee. It keeps nice and fresh and the included scoop is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sam in Boynton Beach

customer_reviews.title: The canister is perfect. Nice design
customer_reviews.text: The canister is perfect. Nice design, matches my stuff, AND I can tell the difference in the taste of the coffee. What more could I want?
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and airtight. Keep the property very fresh. Thinking about purchasing more for different items.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and airtight. Keep the property very fresh. Thinking about purchasing more for different items.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Heckman

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Love the fact that scoop attaches to lid with magnet. Could have been bigger to fit bigger bag of coffee but it goes well with all our silver appliances.
customer_reviews.author: Debi Pride

customer_reviews.title: This is just what I needed to hold my coffee ...
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I needed to hold my coffee beans. I have only had it for a few days, but was something I was seeking.
customer_reviews.author: hummer

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Was very pleased with this replacement to ceramic canister that broke. Good seal and stainless exterior looks good sitting on counter next to stainless coffee maker.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Gaiennie

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Keeps coffee fresh and looks good on the counter. Magnetic spoon/top is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee every time!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great on my counter. Keeps my ground coffee as fresh as the day I opened the package.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Good looking and the magnetic scoop is very convenient. Will buy another one for my friend.
customer_reviews.author: chenjiaci

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: Great for coffee storage. it holds a lot and opens and closes easily. I wish the magnet were a little stronger so the scoop didn't fall into the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing coffee
customer_reviews.text: I love that an entire bag of coffee can fit in this, it seals tightly, and the magnetic scoop is great!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle Malone

customer_reviews.title: Fresh coffee
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Keeps coffee fresh and looks good on the counter
customer_reviews.author: Marlene Serwatka

product_meta.title: BlinkOne Coffee Canister: Airtight Coffee Bean Container Storage with Magnetic Scoop (18 oz)
feature_bullets: ➤ BEST VOTED COFFEE CONTAINER: Unique airtight silicone seal to preserve freshness of whole, roasted beans and ground coffee day in day out. Recommended handwash only.
➤ QUALITY CONSTRUCTION: SS202 stainless steel material enabled one to store coffee without worrying about air leak, moisture penetration and carbon dioxide.
➤ MULTIPURPOSE CANISTER: Not just coffee, BlinkOne container strorage can be used for keeping tea, sugar, salt, spice and other fresh ingredients.
➤ COMPACT AND PRACTICAL: Ideal food saver and storage container with scoop; Dimension: 6.77 inches (L)*5 inches (H)*5 inches (W). Weights 15.90 Oz.

➤ COMPLEMENTARY COFFEE GUIDE: Exclusive BONUS PDF guidebook included on knowledge and tips to select/prepare better coffee. BO339CC is covered by our lifetime guarantee against defects in materials and workmanship with proof of purchase DIRECTLY from BlinkOne on Amazon only.
